1.0.name: wordpress/o-rly-comment-spam-search
1.0.description:
Comment spam is annoying, and although there are great plugins like Akismet to catch spam, annoying "this is best post evar" compliment spam seems to always wiggle through. The best way to tell if a compliment is genuine is to check Google to see if it's been slathered all over the web.

Auto-querying Google is against the ToS, so this plugin just gives you convenient link to do the check.
